summary: An internal FBI email from October 2, 2019, forwarding two draft documents (an RSVP questionnaire and draft email language) related to the Epstein case for review and approval by NY. The email includes a confidentiality notice restricting disclosure.

events.title: Internal FBI Email Forwarding Draft Documents
events.description: An FBI email forwards two draft documents (an RSVP questionnaire and draft email language) related to the Epstein case for review and approval by NY.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email dated October 2, 2019, concerning the Epstein investigation.
The email forwards two draft documents for review and approval: an RSVP questionnaire and draft language for future emails.
The recipient is instructed to have the documents reviewed and approved by 'NY' (likely the New York field office or personnel).
A strict confidentiality notice is included, warning against unauthorized disclosure and citing the Electronic Communication Privacy Act.
The document is marked as internal FBI material not to be released outside the FBI without prior authorization.
